name: Medusa´s Soul
description:
-Description- 

You are now sharing soul with Medusa herself, this means that your body is slowly becoming stone if you don´t find the way to stop her. 

-Player objective-
The player must maintain one single combo of killed enemies using different types of swords, when the player loses it, parts of his body will be locked and turned into stone. 

-Controls-

[WASD] Move
[LMB]  Attack
[Space] Dash
[E] Pick up weapons
[Esc] Pause game

-Credits-

Programming, Art, Sounds: CrowSoul

Main Ideas: ShadowMontage
